column4: I deleted my bottom panel somehow, so I thought "no biggie" and I made a new panel placing my desktop selector, just like how it was before... but because I made the panel myself, when I minimize stuff it doesn't even show it on the bottom bar... how do I get it to do that... can I revert my bottom panel to the one that shows minimized programs or what?
you have to add a panel called "window list" or something, i only know the german name
OK, in settings or... where is it?
right click on the panel and then sth like "add to panel.."
